Group openings

We are currently looking for a new postdoc position. In the LHCb group, you will work will perform measurements of Electroweak/QCD physics and searches for exotic new physics with LHCb, and will contribute to the successful operation of the LHCb detector., please send Henderson an email. you informal inquiries. Candidates should submit an academic CV and a short Statement of Research Experience and Interests online through University of Cincinnati job interface
